page.title: 06Local History
page.content:
Harbottle Castle
Harbottle Castle is now in ruins. The only parts that are clearly seen are the keep and some of the walls. It is now about 1000 years old. The first castle would probably be of wood with a fence round it.Then it would be made of stone. During the 17th and 18th Centuries the old castle was taken down and the stone used to build the new castle which still exists,but added to over the years. The castle is now in a dangerous state and is not open to the public like many other famous castles. It is on private land.
